name: Chained Two
description:
This game was made for Lost Relic Games-GAMEJAM

Lee and Carter are the prisoners in the Garagor's prison.They have to escape.But there is a little problem.They are chained together!

W,A,S,D --> Movement

E --> Switch Player (Note:Your current player has to be grounded or walled.If you are in the air you can't switch.)

ESC --> Options
